column1: Highlights: Dual Band WiFi 6: Speeds up to 3000 Mbps—2402 Mbps on 5 GHz and 574 Mbps on 2.4 GHz.*
Multi-Gig Connections: Break through the 1 Gbps bottleneck with a 2.5 GbE WAN/LAN port for ultra-fast internet access.△
Boosted Coverage: High-performance antennas and beamforming technology combine to extend strong
More Connections: OFDMA and MU-MIMO technologies increase capacity and enable simultaneous transmission to more devices.†
EasyMesh Compatible: Create a unified smart mesh network with seamless coverage and greater flexibility based on standard mesh technology.§
Flexible Deployment and Installation: Supports both 802.3at Power over Ethernet (PoE) and DC power supplies with multiple installation options (ceiling mountable

column3: and parental controls combined ensure personalized and safer online experiences.†

column1: §Mesh network requires two or more devices. This product is compatible with standardized EasyMesh technology but has not obtained the Wi-Fi EasyMeshTM certification.
